ISSUE.TITLE: Add a `tag_id` filter for all models which support tagging
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### NetBox version v4.2.4 ### Feature type Data model extension ### Proposed functionality Add a `tag_id` filter to NetBoxModelFilterSet, which will enable filtering of objects by tag ID. This should function similarly to the existing `tag` filter (which matches by tag slug). For example: `GET /api/dcim/sites/?tag_id=100&tag_id=200` ### Use case This provides an alternative to referencing tags by their slugs, and may be needed in some specific scenarios (such as that described in #18757). ### Database changes N/A ### External dependencies N/A
